com.firebase.authwrapper.resultactivity.types.facebook

Class FacebookActivityInvoker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.firebase.authwrapper.resultactivity.common.ActivityInvoker
      • com.firebase.authwrapper.resultactivity.types.facebook.FacebookActivityInvoker

  • public class FacebookActivityInvoker
extends ActivityInvoker

    This class is the facebook implementation of class ActivityInvoker object. It contains method and properties relevant for authentication by using Facebook API.

    This singleton class is used for binding the FacebookProvider to FacebookResultActivity.

    Since:
    10-5-2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    ron barnoy
    See Also:
    ActivityInvoker
